languages.text: Убийство отца настроило юнцов против вас

traits.locale_text: Убийство отца настроило юнцов против вас

languages.text: "Тебе не следовало убивать нашего отца. Готовься к смерти, Вольный Торговец!"

traits.locale_text: "Тебе не следовало убивать нашего отца. Готовься к смерти, Вольный Торговец!"

languages.text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: "Тебе не следовало убивать нашего отца. Готовься к смерти, Вольный Торговец!"

traits.locale_text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"
"You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"
"You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"
"You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"
"You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: "Ihr hättet unseren Vater nicht töten sollen. Macht Euch bereit, zu sterben, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hättet unseren Vater nicht töten sollen. Macht Euch bereit, zu sterben, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!"

languages.text: « Vous allez payer pour avoir tué notre père. Préparez-vous à mourir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez payer pour avoir tué notre père. Préparez-vous à mourir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: “你不该杀害我们的父亲！去死吧，行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: “你不该杀害我们的父亲！去死吧，行商浪人！”

languages.text: «No debería haber matado a nuestro padre. ¡Prepárese a morir, Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: «No debería haber matado a nuestro padre. ¡Prepárese a morir, Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: 「父を殺すべきではなかった。死を覚悟しろ、ローグトレーダー！」
languages.original_text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: 「父を殺すべきではなかった。死を覚悟しろ、ローグトレーダー！」

languages.original_text: "You should not have killed our father. Prepare to die, Rogue Trader!"
